title.native: スライム倒して300年、知らないうちにレベルMAXになってました
title.romaji: Slime Taoshite 300-nen, Shiranai Uchi ni Level MAX ni Nattemashita
title.english: I've Been Killing Slimes for 300 Years and Maxed Out My Level

description:
An at-home comedy about a powerful girl who doesn’t work too hard!(⋈◍ ˃ᴗ˂ ◍)。✧♡

After dying of overwork in the real world, I’m reincarnated as an immortal witch, and I spend 300 years enjoying a relaxing life. At some point, though, I end up at level 99! All those years spent killing slimes to make the money to pay the bills gave me a ton of experience points… Rumors of the level 99 witch spread, and soon I’m up to my ears in curious adventurers, duelist dragons, and even a monster girl calling me her mom! “This isn’t a dojo, so don’t come here to fight me…!”

I’ve never been on an adventure, but I’m the strongest in the world… What’s going to happen to my relaxing life?!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: 打了300年的史莱姆，不知不觉就练到了满级
La Sorcière invincible tueuse de Slime depuis 300 ans
ล่าสไลม์มา 300 ปีรู้ตัวอีกทีก็เลเวล MAX ซะแล้ว
Tanpa Sadar Levelku Mentok Setelah Membasmi Slime Selama 300 Tahun
Я 300 лет убивала слизь и прокачалась на максимум

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

name.native: プロヴァト・ペコラ・アリエース

node.description:
Freelancer originating from [E&G Films](https://anilist.co/studio/154/).

Frequently works with [Kenji Nakamura](https://anilist.co/staff/102217/), whom he met during his days at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) in the early '00s.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)
Keiji Inai is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with the music production company IMAGINE.

__Hobbies:__ Games, eating, tennis, swimming

[Website](https://columbia.jp/wakiazumi) | [Talent Page](https://haikyo.co.jp/profile/profile.php?ActorID=12722) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/azumi_waki) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ajujustaff) | [Instagram (Personal)](https://www.instagram.com/azumi_waki)

On August 10, 2023, she announced on Twitter her marriage to her longtime partner met through a shared hobby of gaming.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
~!
• Charlotte (Genshin Impact)
 • Mem (Honkai: Star rail)!~

**Height:** 145 cm (4'9")
**Nicknames:** Ao-chan (あおちゃん), Kodomo sensei (こども先生, lit. Child teacher)
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Website (Columbia)](https://columbia.jp/yukiaoi) | [Website (FlyingDog)](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/-/Artist/A023992.html) | [Profile (Aoni Pro)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/yuki-aoi.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/staff_aoi/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aoiyuki_official/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aoi_Yūki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/悠木碧)

Aoi Yabusaki, better known by her stage name Aoi Yuuki, is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer represented by Pro-Fit.

Yuuki entered the entertainment industry at the age of four. As a child, she acted in films and dramas. From 1999 to 2002, she made regular appearances on the variety shows Appare Sanma Dai-sensei and Yappari Sanma Dai-sensei which aired on Fuji TV. When she was in fifth grade, she made her debut as a voice actress as [Sakura](https://anilist.co/character/15429/) on [Kino's Journey](https://anilist.co/anime/486/).

In late 2006, she was affiliated with the theater company Central. After her admission to high school in August 2007, she joined the agency Breath, whilst changing her stage name to Aoi Yuuki. In 2008, she got her first major role in [Kure-nai](https://anilist.co/anime/3358/) as [Murasaki Kuhouin](https://anilist.co/character/10174/). In August of the same year, she moved to the agency Pro-Fit.

In October 2011, she won the Newtype award for best lead voice actress for her role as [Madoka Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/37832/) in [Puella Magi Madoka Magica](https://anilist.co/anime/9756/). She was also awarded for Best Lead Actress in the 6th Seiyuu Awards for Madoka Kaname, [Victorique de Blois](https://anilist.co/character/20170/) and [Tooru Ichii](https://anilist.co/character/38904/).

In 2013, Yuuki and [Ayana Taketatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101996/) formed the singing unit [petit milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523).

**Non-anime voice roles:** 
- [Lumine](https://anilist.co/character/209682/Ying) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Gwen Stacy - Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (Movie); Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Movie)
- Renne Bright - Eiyuu Densetsu: Sen no Kiseki IV (VG), Eiyuu Densetsu: Hajimari no Kiseki (VG), Eiyuu Densetsu: Kuro no Kiseki (VG)
- Yurusen - Kamen Rider Ghost (VG)
- Fiona - Xenoblade Chronicles 3 (VG)
- Rita Rossweisse - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Moddey - Memento Mori (VG)
- Futaba Sakura - Persona 5/Royal (VG)
- Pascal - NieR: Automata (VG) (VG)
- Nian - Arknights (VG)
- Istina - Arknights (VG)
- Ravi & Apocalyptic Ravi - Epic 7 (VG)
- Schneider - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
- Lysithea - Fire Emblem: Three Houses (VG)
- Cinderella - Nikke: Goddess of Victory (VG)
- Sugar - Reverse Collapse: Code Name Bakery (VG)
A Mexican voice actress. She is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Nurse Joy in _Pokémon_ and Felicity Smoak/Overwatch  in the _Arrowverse_.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.
